pkgmetadata.longdescription: Power Calculation for Weighted Log-Rank Tests in Cure Rate Models // This package contains R-functions to perform power calculation in a group sequential clinical trial with censored survival data and possibly unequal patient allocation between treatment and control groups. The fuctions can also be used to determine the study duration in a clinical trial with censored survival data as the sum of the accrual duration, which determines the sample size in a traditional sense, and the follow-up duration, which more or less controls the number of events to be observed. This package also contains R functions and methods to display the computed results.
